00012 #include "../GeneralInclude/Constants.h"

00014 #include "../Telemetry/DC_FileTelemetryStream.h"
00015 #include "../Telemetry/DC_DummyTelemetryPacket.h"
00016 #include "TestCaseFileTelemetryStream_2.h"
00017 #include <stdio.h>
00018 
00019 TestCaseFileTelemetryStream_2::TestCaseFileTelemetryStream_2(void) :
00020         TestCaseGenericSetUp(ID_FILETELEMETRYSTREAM*10+2,"TestCaseFileTelemetryStream_2") {
00021                 return;
00022 }
00023 
00024 void TestCaseFileTelemetryStream_2::runTestCase(void) {
00025 
00026    DC_FileTelemetryStream* pTmStream = new DC_FileTelemetryStream();
00027 
00028    // Load the telemetry stream and check correctness
00029    FILE* out=pNULL;
00030    pTmStream->setOutputStream(out);
00031    if ( pTmStream->getOutputStream() != pNULL )
00032    {    setTestResult(TEST_FAILURE, "Wrong telemetry stream file");
00033         return;
00034    }
00035 
00036    // Create and configure the telemetry packet to be written to the stream
00037    DC_DummyTelemetryPacket* pTI = new DC_DummyTelemetryPacket();
00038    pTI->setNumberOfBytes(2);
00039    pTI->setValue(0,1);
00040    pTI->setValue(1,2);
00041 
00042    // Write telemetry packet to the telemetry stream
00043    pTmStream->write(pTI);
00044    pTmStream->flush();
00045    pTI->setValue(0,2);
00046    pTI->setValue(1,3);
00047    pTmStream->write(pTI);
00048    pTmStream->flush();
00049 
00050    // Close output file and set test result message
00051    if ( out != pNULL )
00052     fclose(out);
00053    setTestResult(TEST_SUCCESS, "Check standard output");
00054    return;
00055 }
